dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform

Class DefaultWidgetDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.AbstractWidgetDescription
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.DefaultWidgetDescription

  • public class DefaultWidgetDescription
extends AbstractWidgetDescription
    The DefaultWidgetDescription allows to create new widgets by calling methods on a AbstractWidgetDescriptions class described by DefaultParameterDescriptions.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2009.a

      Creates a new DefaultWidgetDescription.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISWTWidget doAddWidget(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent, WidgetModel element)
      Creates a new instance of the widget described by a WidgetModel and adds the widget to a parent composite.
      java.lang.String doGetMethodName(java.lang.String type)
      Get the name of the method to call at the WidgetFactory in order to instantiate a new instance of the widget.
      DefaultParameterDescription[] getParameterDescriptions()
      Get the description of the parameters that are given to the method that creates the widget.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultWidgetDescription

        public DefaultWidgetDescription(AbstractWidgetDescriptions factory,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                DefaultParameterDescription[] parameterDescriptions)
        Creates a new DefaultWidgetDescription.
        Parameters:
        factory - The factory to use to create the widget
        type - The type of the widget (corresponds to the method name of the factory via which to create the widget)
        parameterDescriptions - Description of the parameters to hand to the method of the factory
        Since:
        2009.a

    • Method Detail

      • getParameterDescriptions

        public DefaultParameterDescription[] getParameterDescriptions()
        Get the description of the parameters that are given to the method that creates the widget.
        Returns:
        The method parameters
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doGetMethodName

        public java.lang.String doGetMethodName(java.lang.String type)
        Get the name of the method to call at the WidgetFactory in order to instantiate a new instance of the widget.

        This default implementation returns "create" + UpperCaseFirstCharacter( type )

        Parameters:
        type - The type of the widget
        Returns:
        The name of the method to call
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doAddWidget

        public ISWTWidget doAddWidget(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                              WidgetModel element)
                       throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Description copied from class: AbstractWidgetDescription
        Creates a new instance of the widget described by a WidgetModel and adds the widget to a parent composite.
        Specified by:
        doAddWidget in class AbstractWidgetDescription
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent to add the widget to
        element - The description of the widget parameter
        Returns:
        The new widget
        Throws:
